review_title:
The greatest humanitarian organization. 
Complicated working environment. 
Demanding employees and self-centered.
pros:
Great place to work. 
Very structured process and plenty of benefits for employees. 
Full of learning opportunities. 
Good diversity and work life balance.
cons:
Political leadership.
Not strong punishment and rewards system. 
Employees are self-centered by wrong support of the local management team.
Bad working culture at delegation level.

pros:
-Good location
-Good work life balance
-Good friend
-Good benefit
-Good career path
cons:
- Time different
-slow process
-a lot of meeting
Very large organisation so sometimes lots of bureaucracy
